channel.title: Medical Advertising on Grant County Economic Development
channel.description: Recent content in Medical Advertising on Grant County Economic Development

item.title: Wesley Medical Center
item.description: I worked on the campaign “Intensive Caring” for Wesley Medical Center. The print campaign coordinated :30 second tv spots followed by a print campaign that was ran in various media outlets throughout the area. I worked with a talented group of individuals, and we won a Silver Addy for our efforts.
